allow: Bash(do node -e "const fs = require(''''fs''''); let content = fs.readFileSync(''''$file'''', ''''utf8''''); if (content.includes(''''request.'''')) { content = content.replace(/_request:/g, ''''request:''''); fs.writeFileSync(''''$file'''', content); console.log(''''Fixed: $file''''); }")
Bash(timeout 30 bash -c 'while ! grep -q """"Compiled successfully\|Failed to compile"""" <(npm run build 2>&1); do sleep 1; done; npm run build 2>&1')
